text: Nordstrom Rack is an American off-price department store chain. It was founded in 1973. It is a sister brand to the luxury department store chain Nordstrom. As of 2023, Nordstrom Rack operates 348 stores in 41 U.S. states. Category:1973 establishments in the United States Category:American department stores Category:Department stores of Canada Category:Discount stores of Canada
title: Nordstrom Rack
